input.name: url
input.description: The URL to be parsed, e.g. `https://user:pass@www.example.com:8080/path/to/page?x=0&y=1#top`.

output.name: origin
output.description: The origin of the URL, e.g. `https://www.example.com:8080`.

output.name: protocol
output.description: The protocol portion of the URL, e.g. `https:`.

output.name: username
output.description: The username portion of the URL, e.g. `user`.

output.name: password
output.description: The password portion of the URL, e.g. `pass`.

output.name: host
output.description: The host portion of the URL, e.g. `www.example.com:8080`.

output.name: hostname
output.description: The host name portion of the URL, e.g. `www.example.com`.

output.name: port
output.description: The port portion of the URL, e.g. `8080`.

output.name: path
output.description: The path portion of the URL, e.g. `/path/to/page`.

output.name: query string
output.description: The host portion of the URL, e.g. `?x=0&y=1`.

output.name: query values
output.description: The query portion of the URL in a map format of key to value.

output.name: hash
output.description: The fragment portion of the URL, e.g. `#top`.
